transcript:

Executive: Ha dekhoge aapko meri screen pe aaoge dashboard pe area mein to aapko home by lead lead manager aur aapko manage products ka option dikh raha hai niche mein.

Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough work.

- Wants to know how to use IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to download and login.

- Executive offered to guide via Google Meet.

- Sent Google Meet invitation link to customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join Google Meet later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- indiamart, google meet, app, login
